purpose: Facilitate the orchestration and collaboration of diverse AI agents to solve complex tasks through distributed systems
principle: Utilizes a framework for multi-agent coordination, allowing agents to communicate and collaborate over a network
reusability: Designed to be modular and extensible, allowing developers to integrate their own agents and customize interactions
limitations: Still in alpha stage, potential stability issues, limited documentation and community support
name: IoA
description: An open-source framework for collaborative AI agents, enabling diverse, distributed agents to team up and tackle complex tasks through internet-like connectivity.
highlight: Enables collaborative AI agents to connect and work together in a distributed, internet-like fashion
